text:
I’m not crying.  There’s something in my eye.

Please may I share this rare moment of joy from Northwick Park Hospital this afternoon.  

Retired now returned nurse on piano and consultant on the violin serenading A&E sister being discharged after close call with #coronavirus https://t.co/jdSB5F5pWY
